<li id="cite_note-Joint_Statement-351"><span class="mw-cite-backlink noprint"><a href="#cite_ref-Joint_Statement_351-0">↑</a> </span><span class="reference-text"><span class="ouvrage" id="Brasileira_de_Ciéncias_(Brésil)Society_of_CanadaAcademy_of_Sciencesdes_Sciences_(France)2009"><span class="ouvrage" id="Academia_Brasileira_de_Ciéncias_(Brésil)Royal_Society_of_CanadaChinese_Academy_of_SciencesAcadémie_des_Sciences_(France)2009"><abbr class="abbr indicateur-langue" title="Langue : anglais">(en)</abbr> Academia Brasileira de Ciéncias (Brésil), Royal Society of Canada, Chinese Academy of Sciences, Académie des Sciences (France), Deutsche Akademie der Naturforscher Leopoldina (Allemagne), Indian National Science Academy, Accademia Nazionale dei Lincei (Italie), Science Council of Japan, Academia Mexicana de Ciencias, Russian Academy of Sciences, Academy of Science of South Africa, Royal Society (Royaume-Uni) et National Academy of Sciences (États-Unis), <span lang="en"><a class="external text" href="http://www.nationalacademies.org/includes/G8+5energy-climate09.pdf" rel="nofollow">« <cite style="font-style:normal;">G8+5 Academies' joint statement: Climate change and the transformation of energy technologies for a low carbon future</cite> »</a></span>, The National Academies of Sciences, Engineering, and Medicine, <time class="nowrap" data-sort-value="2009-05" datetime="2009-05">mai 2009</time> <small style="line-height:1em;">(consulté le <time class="nowrap" data-sort-value="2010-05-05" datetime="2010-05-05">5 mai 2010</time>)</small></span></span>.</span>

<li id="cite_note-352"><span class="mw-cite-backlink noprint"><a href="#cite_ref-352">↑</a> </span><span class="reference-text"><span class="ouvrage" id="Society2005"><span class="ouvrage" id="Royal_Society2005"><abbr class="abbr indicateur-langue" title="Langue : anglais">(en)</abbr> Royal Society, <cite class="italique" lang="en">Economic Affairs – Written Evidence</cite>, UK Parliament, <abbr class="abbr" title="collection">coll.</abbr> « The Economics of Climate Change, the Second Report of the 2005–2006 session, produced by the UK Parliament House of Lords Economics Affairs Select Committee », <time class="nowrap" data-sort-value="2005-04-13" datetime="2005-04-13">13 avril 2005</time> <small style="line-height:1em;">(<a class="external text" href="https://publications.parliament.uk/pa/ld200506/ldselect/ldeconaf/12/12we24.htm" rel="nofollow">lire en ligne</a>)</small><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook&amp;rft.genre=book&amp;rft.btitle=Economic+Affairs+%E2%80%93+Written+Evidence&amp;rft.pub=UK+Parliament&amp;rft.aulast=Society&amp;rft.aufirst=Royal&amp;rft.date=2005-04-13&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Ffr.wikipedia.org%3AR%C3%A9chauffement+climatique"></span></span></span>.</span>

<li id="cite_note-370"><span class="mw-cite-backlink noprint"><a href="#cite_ref-370">↑</a> </span><span class="reference-text"><span class="ouvrage" id="HarveyVan_den_BergEllersKampen2018"><span class="ouvrage" id="Jeffrey_A._HarveyDaphne_Van_den_BergJacintha_EllersRemko_Kampen2018"><abbr class="abbr indicateur-langue" title="Langue : anglais">(en)</abbr> Jeffrey A. <span class="nom_auteur">Harvey</span>, Daphne <span class="nom_auteur">Van den Berg</span>, Jacintha <span class="nom_auteur">Ellers</span>, Remko <span class="nom_auteur">Kampen</span>, Thomas W. <span class="nom_auteur">Crowther</span>, Peter <span class="nom_auteur">Roessingh</span>, Bart <span class="nom_auteur">Verheggen</span>, Rascha J. <li id="cite_note-383"><span class="mw-cite-backlink noprint"><a href="#cite_ref-383">↑</a> </span><span class="reference-text"><span class="ouvrage" id="Lapenis1998"><span class="ouvrage" id="Andrei_G._Lapenis1998"><abbr class="abbr indicateur-langue" title="Langue : anglais">(en)</abbr> Andrei G. <span class="nom_auteur">Lapenis</span>, <span lang="en">« <cite style="font-style:normal;">Arrhenius and the Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change</cite> »</span>, <i><span class="lang-en" lang="en">Eos</span></i>, <abbr class="abbr" title="volume">vol.</abbr> 79, <abbr class="abbr" title="numéro">n<sup>o</sup></abbr> 23,‎ <time>1998</time>, <abbr class="abbr" title="page">p.</abbr> 271 <small style="line-height:1em;">(<a href="/wiki/Digital_Object_Identifier" title="Digital Object Identifier">DOI</a> <span class="plainlinks noarchive nowrap"><a class="external text" href="https://dx.doi.org/10.1029/98EO00206" rel="nofollow">10.1029/98EO00206</a></span>, <a href="/wiki/Bibcode" title="Bibcode">Bibcode</a> <span class="plainlinks noarchive nowrap"><a class="external text" href="https://ui.adsabs.harvard.edu/abs/1998EOSTr..79..271L" rel="nofollow">1998EOSTr..79..271L</a></span>)</small><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&amp;rft.genre=article&amp;rft.atitle=Arrhenius+and+the+Intergovernmental+Panel+on+Climate+Change&amp;rft.jtitle=Eos&amp;rft.issue=23&amp;rft.aulast=Lapenis&amp;rft.aufirst=Andrei+G.&amp;rft.date=1998&amp;rft.volume=79&amp;rft.pages=271&amp;rft_id=info%3Adoi%2F10.1029%2F98EO00206&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Ffr.wikipedia.org%3AR%C3%A9chauffement+climatique"></span></span></span>.</span>

<li id="cite_note-wtcdge1-384"><span class="mw-cite-backlink noprint">↑ <sup><a href="#cite_ref-wtcdge1_384-0">a</a> <a href="#cite_ref-wtcdge1_384-1">b</a> et <a href="#cite_ref-wtcdge1_384-2">c</a></sup> </span><span class="reference-text"><span class="ouvrage" id="Weart_:_«_The_Carbon_Dioxide_Greenhouse_Effect_»"><abbr class="abbr indicateur-langue" title="Langue : anglais">(en)</abbr> Spencer <span class="nom_auteur">Weart</span>, <cite lang="en" style="font-style:normal">« The Carbon Dioxide Greenhouse Effect »</cite>, dans <cite class="italique" lang="en">The Discovery of Global Warming</cite>, American Institute of Physics, <time class="nowrap" data-sort-value="2020-01" datetime="2020-01">janvier 2020</time> <small style="line-height:1em;">(<a class="external text" href="http://history.aip.org/climate/co2.htm" rel="nofollow">lire en ligne</a>)</small><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook&amp;rft.genre=bookitem&amp;rft.btitle=The+Discovery+of+Global+Warming&amp;rft.atitle=The+Carbon+Dioxide+Greenhouse+Effect&amp;rft.pub=American+Institute+of+Physics&amp;rft.aulast=Weart&amp;rft.aufirst=Spencer&amp;rft.date=2020&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Ffr.wikipedia.org%3AR%C3%A9chauffement+climatique"></span></span>.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-wtcdge2-385"><span class="mw-cite-backlink noprint">↑ <sup><a href="#cite_ref-wtcdge2_385-0">a</a> <a href="#cite_ref-wtcdge2_385-1">b</a> et <a href="#cite_ref-wtcdge2_385-2">c</a></sup> </span><span class="reference-text"><span class="ouvrage"><abbr class="abbr indicateur-langue" title="Langue : anglais">(en)</abbr> <span lang="en"><a class="external text" href="http://nsdl.library.cornell.edu/websites/wiki/index.php/PALE_ClassicArticles/GlobalWarming/Article4.html" rel="nofollow">« <cite style="font-style:normal;">On the Influence of Carbonic Acid in the Air upon the Temperature of the Ground</cite> »</a></span>, sur <span class="italique">nsdl.library.cornell.edu</span> <small style="line-height:1em;">(consulté le <time class="nowrap" data-sort-value="2021-06-17" datetime="2021-06-17">17 juin 2021</time>)</small></span>.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-386"><span class="mw-cite-backlink noprint"><a href="#cite_ref-386">↑</a> </span><span class="reference-text"><span class="ouvrage" id="Callendar1938"><span class="ouvrage" id="G._S._Callendar1938"><abbr class="abbr indicateur-langue" title="Langue : anglais">(en)</abbr> <a href="/wiki/Guy_Stewart_Callendar" title="Guy Stewart Callendar">G. S. <span class="nom_auteur">Callendar</span></a>, <span lang="en">« <cite style="font-style:normal;">The artificial production of carbon dioxide and its influence on temperature</cite> »</span>, <i><span class="lang-en" lang="en">Quarterly Journal of the Royal Meteorological Society</span></i>, <abbr class="abbr" title="volume">vol.</abbr> 64, <abbr class="abbr" title="numéro">n<sup>o</sup></abbr> 275,‎ <time>1938</time>, <abbr class="abbr" title="pages">p.</abbr> 223-240 <small style="line-height:1em;">(<a href="/wiki/Digital_Object_Identifier" title="Digital Object Identifier">DOI</a> <span class="plainlinks noarchive nowrap"><a class="external text" href="https://dx.doi.org/10.1002/qj.49706427503" rel="nofollow">10.1002/qj.49706427503</a></span>, <a href="/wiki/Bibcode" title="Bibcode">Bibcode</a> <span class="plainlinks noarchive nowrap"><a class="external text" href="https://ui.adsabs.harvard.edu/abs/1938QJRMS..64..223C" rel="nofollow">1938QJRMS..64..223C</a></span>)</small><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&amp;rft.genre=article&amp;rft.atitle=The+artificial+production+of+carbon+dioxide+and+its+influence+on+temperature&amp;rft.jtitle=Quarterly+Journal+of+the+Royal+Meteorological+Society&amp;rft.issue=275&amp;rft.aulast=Callendar&amp;rft.aufirst=G.+S.&amp;rft.date=1938&amp;rft.volume=64&amp;rft.pages=223-240&amp;rft_id=info%3Adoi%2F10.1002%2Fqj.49706427503&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Ffr.wikipedia.org%3AR%C3%A9chauffement+climatique"></span></span></span>.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-387"><span class="mw-cite-backlink noprint"><a href="#cite_ref-387">↑</a> </span><span class="reference-text"><span class="ouvrage" id="Fleming2007"><span class="ouvrage" id="James_Rodger_Fleming2007"><abbr class="abbr indicateur-langue" title="Langue : anglais">(en)</abbr> James Rodger <span class="nom_auteur">Fleming</span>, <cite class="italique" lang="en">The Callendar Effect: the life and work of Guy Stewart Callendar (1898–1964)</cite>, Boston, American Meteorological Society, <time>2007</time> <small style="line-height:1em;">(<a href="/wiki/International_Standard_Book_Number" title="International Standard Book Number">ISBN</a> <a href="/wiki/Sp%C3%A9cial:Ouvrages_de_r%C3%A9f%C3%A9rence/978-1-878220-76-9" title="Spécial:Ouvrages de référence/978-1-878220-76-9"><span class="nowrap">978-1-878220-76-9</span></a>)</small><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook&amp;rft.genre=book&amp;rft.btitle=The+Callendar+Effect%3A+the+life+and+work+of+Guy+Stewart+Callendar+%281898%E2%80%931964%29&amp;rft.place=Boston&amp;rft.pub=American+Meteorological+Society&amp;rft.aulast=Fleming&amp;rft.aufirst=James+Rodger&amp;rft.date=2007&amp;rft.isbn=978-1-878220-76-9&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Ffr.wikipedia.org%3AR%C3%A9chauffement+climatique"></span></span></span>.</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-388"><span class="mw-cite-backlink noprint"><a href="#cite_ref-388">↑</a> </span><span class="reference-text"><span class="ouvrage" id="Weart2020"><span class="ouvrage" id="Spencer_Weart2020"><abbr class="abbr indicateur-langue" title="Langue : anglais">(en)</abbr> Spencer <span class="nom_auteur">Weart</span>, <cite lang="en" style="font-style:normal">« The Public and Climate Change: Suspicions of a Human-Caused Greenhouse (1956–1969) »</cite>, dans <cite class="italique" lang="en">The Discovery of Global Warming</cite>, American Institute of Physics, <time class="nowrap" data-sort-value="2020-01" datetime="2020-01">janvier 2020</time> <small style="line-height:1em;">(<a class="external text" href="http://history.aip.org/climate/public.htm#S2" rel="nofollow">lire en ligne</a>)</small><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook&amp;rft.genre=bookitem&amp;rft.btitle=The+Discovery+of+Global+Warming&amp;rft.atitle=The+Public+and+Climate+Change%3A+Suspicions+of+a+Human-Caused+Greenhouse+%281956%E2%80%931969%29&amp;rft.pub=American+Institute+of+Physics&amp;rft.aulast=Weart&amp;rft.aufirst=Spencer&amp;rft.date=2020-01&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Ffr.wikipedia.org%3AR%C3%A9chauffement+climatique"></span></span></span>.</span>

<li id="cite_note-389"><span class="mw-cite-backlink noprint"><a href="#cite_ref-389">↑</a> </span><span class="reference-text"><span class="ouvrage" id="Weart2020"><span class="ouvrage" id="Spencer_Weart2020"><abbr class="abbr indicateur-langue" title="Langue : anglais">(en)</abbr> Spencer <span class="nom_auteur">Weart</span>, <cite lang="en" style="font-style:normal">« The Public and Climate Change: The Summer of 1988 »</cite>, dans <cite class="italique" lang="en">The Discovery of Global Warming</cite>, American Institute of Physics, <time class="nowrap" data-sort-value="2020-01" datetime="2020-01">janvier 2020</time> <small style="line-height:1em;">(<a class="external text" href="http://history.aip.org/climate/public2.htm#S1988" rel="nofollow">lire en ligne</a>)</small><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook&amp;rft.genre=bookitem&amp;rft.btitle=The+Discovery+of+Global+Warming&amp;rft.atitle=The+Public+and+Climate+Change%3A+The+Summer+of+1988&amp;rft.pub=American+Institute+of+Physics&amp;rft.aulast=Weart&amp;rft.aufirst=Spencer&amp;rft.date=2020-01&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Ffr.wikipedia.org%3AR%C3%A9chauffement+climatique"></span></span></span>.</span>

</div></td>
</tr> <tr>
